Spring Valley Hyaluronic Acid Serum (2018 formulation)

Brand: Spring Valley

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER (DEMINERALIZED), GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE SOURCE), SODIUM HYALURONATE (HYALURONIC ACID), CITRIC ACID, POLYSORBATE 20, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE.

Ingredients: WATER (DEMINERALIZED), GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE SOURCE), SODIUM HYALURONATE (HYALURONIC ACID), CITRIC ACID, POLYSORBATE 20, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM BENZOATE.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
